about_the_game:
Two Putt is a mini golf party game where you control multiple golfers at the same time. Help Komakai and Kyoichi conquer 100+ courses and 20+ wacky mini games to become mini golf champions! 🏆 1-4 players




In single player mode, you control Komakai with the left joystick/left trigger, and Kyoichi with the right joystick/right trigger. Both must putt at the same time! In multiplayer mode, each player controls 1-2 golfers. All golfers on screen must putt at the same time, so make sure to coordinate with your team!



There are 50+ wacky mini games interspersed between holes. Mini games can also be enjoyed standalone in Party mode!



Dual joystick controllers are required for each player. Mouse and keyboard is not supported.
